name: DreamWorks Dragons: Dawn of New Riders
description: Join the new heroic duo, Scribbler and Patch, in an epic battle to save dragons and defeat the villain, Eir, who is controlling dragons to carry out her evil plans.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 (2.4 GHz) or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 430 (1024 MB)/ Radeon HD 6850 (1024 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Windows Vista and DirectXÂ® 9.0b and below not supported
